
{{Client function}}
{{New items|3.014|1.4 r6208|
This function gets the speed of a specified [[/effect.md|effect]].
}}

==Syntax==
<syntaxhighlight lang="lua">
float getEffectSpeed ( effect theEffect )
</syntaxhighlight>
{{OOP||[[/effect.md|effect]]:getSpeed|speed|setEffectSpeed}}

===Required Arguments=== 
*'''theEffect:''' The [[/effect.md|effect]] to get the speed of.

===Returns===
Returns [[/float.md|float]] containing the effect's speed, ''false'' if invalid arguments were specified.

===Example===
This example adds command ''ges'' that creates crate explosion effect at the player's position and outputs its speed to the chatbox.
<syntaxhighlight lang="Lua">
addCommandHandler("ges", 
function (cmd)
   local x, y, z = getElementPosition(localPlayer)
   local effect = createEffect("explosion_crate", x, y, z)
   outputChatBox("The speed: " .. tostring(getEffectSpeed(effect)))
end)
</syntaxhighlight>
